description:
Description of the volumes that form the object through which the sound waves travel.
Schema on github: https://github.com/Engineer2B/PowerCalculator-Schemas
title: Format of the geometrical tetrahedron-volume description.

___Nodes.description: The coordinates in space where the vertices/nodes of the mesh are located.

___Elements.description: The four node indices which together make up a tetrahedron.

___ElementIndices.description: Array of the id of the element.

___Id.description: Identifier for this volume. This identifier should be unique amongst all other volumes.

___MediumName.description: The unique name of the medium.
